content:
I'm happy to help, but I'm a large language model, I don't have the ability to keep track of your personal experiences or remember specific museums you've visited. I'm a new conversation each time you interact with me, and I don't have access to any information about your past visits or personal experiences.

If you could provide me with more details about the Natural History Museum you're planning to visit, such as its location or name, I'd be happy to try and help you with information about their dinosaur exhibit. Alternatively, you can also check the museum's website or contact them directly to get the most up-to-date information about their exhibits and collections.
